name: Jon The Cowboy
description:
In this classic style top-down shooter, you play as Jon a cowboy who has found himself in the middle of a zombie apocalypse.

This is a very early prototype build for a game that I am developing in the Unity game engine. I hope to eventually turn this into a fully-fledged game with an overarching storyline.  Any donations are greatly appreciated and will help enormously with future development.
